name: OKStateStat
description: OKStateStat is Oklahoma's performance informed budgeting website. Oklahoma now aligns measurable outcomes and state dollars to state priorities, called statewide programs, within the five goal areas below. By aligning financial and performance information to statewide programs, progress made and dollars spent can be seen side by side. For the first time, Oklahomans have a view of how their state government is using resources to achieve meaningful results.
